vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
στήκω,
late present formed from ἕστηκα (perfect of ἵστημι), stand, [LXX+NT]; participle, παρὼν καὶ στήγων (sic) [Refs 4th c.AD+]; so ἑστήκω, [Refs 3rd c.BC+].
vocabInfos.shortDef: to stand, stand firm, be steadfast
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to stand, stand firm, be steadfast
to stand, Mk. 3:31; 11:25; metaphorically to stand when under judgment, to be approved, Rom. 14:4; to stand firm, be constant, be steadfast, persevere, 1Cor. 16:13; Gal. 5:1; Phil. 1:27; 4:1; 1Thess. 3:8; 2Thess. 2:15*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: estar de pie, ponerse de pie, quedarse; aguantar, soportar, tolerar; mantenerse firme
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 站立
2) (堅定信念) 站穩
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 站立
2) (坚定信念) 站稳
